item.title: Quest Tap:)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:3, topic:381963”]You could just over-write that text by adding this to your texthandler:

c.sendQuest("Player Online [" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + "] ", 663); c.sendQuest("@yel@fill these in", 7332); c.sendQuest("@gre@however you want", 7333); c.sendQuest("@gre@it's not hard", 7334); c.sendQuest("@gre@find some guide", 7336); c.sendQuest("@gre@", 7383); c.sendQuest("@gre@", 7339); c.sendQuest("@gre@@", 7338); c.sendQuest(" ", 640); c.sendQuest(" ", 7340); c.sendQuest(" ", 7346); c.sendQuest(" ", 7341); c.sendQuest(" ", 7342); c.sendQuest(" ", 7337); c.sendQuest("i just copied", 7343); c.sendQuest("and wiped this", 7335); c.sendQuest("from a random", 7344); c.sendQuest("delta-based", 7345); c.sendQuest("source", 7347); c.sendQuest(" ", 7348);[/quote]

… He isn’t talking about that.
